import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Logo2 from "../../../assets/Logo2.png"; const Login = () => { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); // State untuk menentukan form yang aktif return (
{/* Container for the forms */}
{/* Form Login */}

Login

{/* Form Reset Password */}

Reset Password

{/* Right Side - Toggle Button */}

{isLogin ? 'Forget Password?' : 'Back to Login'}

{isLogin ? 'Register with your personal details to use all of the site\'s features' : 'Go back to login to access your account'}

); }; export default Login;
